actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to prohibit discriminatory employment practices with respect to physically handicapped persons.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Prohibits, under the Civil Rights Act of 1964, discriminatory employment practices with respect to physically handicapped persons.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit discriminatory employment practices with respect to physically handicapped persons.
